playn.core.gl
Interface GLShader

All Known Subinterfaces:
GLShader.Color, GLShader.Texture
All Known Implementing Classes:
IndexedTrisShader
public interface GLShader

Defines the interface to shaders used by the GL core.

Nested Class Summary
static interface GLShader.Color
          Defines the interface to the color shader.
static interface GLShader.Texture
          Defines the interface to the texture shader.

static String VERTEX_SHADER
          The GLSL code for the vertex shader.

addTriangles

void addTriangles(InternalTransform local,
                  float[] xys,
                  float texWidth,
                  float texHeight,
                  int[] indices)
Adds a collection of triangles to the current render operation.

Parameters:
xys - a list of x/y coordinates as: [x1, y1, x2, y2, ...].
texWidth - the width of the texture for which we will auto-generate texture coordinates.
texHeight - the height of the texture for which we will auto-generate texture coordinates.
indices - the index of the triangle vertices in the supplied xys array. This must be in proper winding order for OpenGL rendering.

addTriangles

void addTriangles(InternalTransform local,
                  float[] xys,
                  float[] sxys,
                  int[] indices)
Adds a collection of triangles to the current render operation.

Parameters:
xys - a list of x/y coordinates as: [x1, y1, x2, y2, ...].
sxys - a list of sx/sy texture coordinates as: [sx1, sy1, sx2, sy2, ...]. This must be of the same length as xys.
indices - the index of the triangle vertices in the supplied xys array. This must be in proper winding order for OpenGL rendering.

flush

void flush()
Sends all accumulated vertex/element info to GL.
